title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 02 June 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:21 <jamie\_\_wiki> How do you run a set of functional tests from maven? eg for the REST functional tests..  
00:22 <@cjd> cd xwiki-enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-test/xwiki-enterprise-test-webdav  
00:22 <@cjd> mvn clean install  
00:23 <jamie\_\_wiki> ok..   do you need to setup a seperate xwiki instance etc? Or just make sure you have a specific tcp port not in use?  
00:23 <@sdumitriu> It will either run on top of an existing XWiki instance, or start a new one on port 8080  
00:24 <@cjd> yeap, just make sure port 8080 is unused  
00:24 <@cjd> ahh yes, it can run on an existing one, which in my experience causes really odd things to happen to the tests  
00:24 <jamie\_\_wiki> ok, sounds good.  I moved my other instance to a different port as I didn't want "things to go wrong" :)  
00:27 <jamie\_\_wiki> It's downloading xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb-4.1 right now..  thanks.  
00:28 <jamie\_\_wiki> Functional testing here http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Testing  doesn't mention too much.. thanks for the info.  
00:42 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
00:57 <CIA-117> Eduard Moraru stable-4.0.x \* r6ffacca https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/6ffacca5563f60a62bd6acc17daf31d2f3cf7309 / (3 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-7872: Can't use the velocity macro inside Dashboard gadgets - http://git.io/jWqdrg
